title: Convenient Location, Complimentary WiFi, Schedule a Tour
posting_body: ['VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'Aurora Hills, managed by BLDG Management', '11850 E. Maple Ave.', 'Aurora, CO 80012', 'show contact info', 'Located in the heart of Aurora, Colorado - Aurora Hills offers one- two- and three-bedroom apartment homes set-back on a 52-acre lot with large trees and lush landscaping.', 'Lease today!', 'This spacious two bedroom two bathroom apartment has all the space that you need!', 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.', 'Units are available now and we offer pre-leasing!', 'Community Features', '* Cardio Room', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Liability Insurance is Required', '* se habla espanol', '* Covered Parking', '* Basketball Court', '* Professionally Managed', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Sand Volleyball Court', '* Swimming Pool', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Laundry Care Center', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* Non Smoking Community', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Fitness Studio', '* Foosball', '* Reserved Parking', '* Short Term Lease Available', '* Volleyball Court', '* Playground', '* Bark Park', '* Package Acceptance', '* Guest Parking', '* Multi Function Study Rooms with Copier and Computers', '* Extra Storage', '* Tennis Court', '* Sun Deck', '[#9340619]']
